description: Returns database information for the specified environment ID.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the kdb database.

nested_items.name: databaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the kdb database for which the information is retrieved.

nested_items.name: databaseArn
nested_items.description: The ARN identifier of the database.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: createdTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the database is created in FinSpace. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The last time that the database was modified. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.

nested_items.name: lastCompletedChangesetId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the changeset.

nested_items.name: numBytes
nested_items.description: The total number of bytes in the database.

nested_items.name: numChangesets
nested_items.description: The total number of changesets in the database.

nested_items.name: numFiles
nested_items.description: The total number of files in the database.
